summary: RDMA/mlx5: Initialize the ODP xarray when creating an ODP MR
details:
RDMA/mlx5: Initialize the ODP xarray when creating an ODP MR

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.16 by commit 5f6995295f65d1ee6f36d466d26afd98eb797afe, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit a639e66703ee45745dc4057c7c2013ed9e1963a7. For more details please see the references link.
